name: CD "My Favourite Dependence"
description:
Date of release - 01/01/2010.

15 tracks:

1. My Favourite Dependence
2. Celtic Song
3. Davvero Finita
4. When You See Me Again (Dance Mix)
5. Spider On The Heart
6. Pour Te Garder
7. In My World
8. Questa Vita Mi Basterà
9. Les Grands Voyageurs
10. Per Noi
11. Mon Univers
12. Spider On The Heart (Dance Mix)
13. When You See Me Again
14. My Favourite Dependence (Extended Mix)
15. Celtic Song (Extended Mix)

“My Favourite Dependence” is the first album from Marina Tihvinskaya.

Following three months in the studio, in a quiet part of Paris free from all hubbub, this young international artist takes us on a musical journey, swinging for our delight from electro to pop-rock.

Often as composer and always as interpreter, Marina Tihvinskaya is truly international, singing with authority in several languages. In this extremely intimate album, English, Italian and French songs merrily follow each other as a hymn to the Europe which she loves to visit.
